name: Sozimia
description:
The year is 2521. 200 years earlier, Earth became overpopulated and uninhabitable, which meant that humans had to move to other planets.

You play as Joe McBurger, a hunter living on Sozimia. Sozimia is an ice planet with over 5000 inhabitants. In order not to let Sozimia have the same fate as Earth had, robots were created to control the planet for them. But the people quickly lost all their rights and their lives became miserable. You, Joe McBurger, are destined to save Sozimia from the rule of the evil robots and restore human freedom.
